metadata.title: CVE-2024-45617 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in OpenSC, OpenSC tools, PKCS#11 module,minidriver, and CTK. An attacker could use a crafted USB Device or SmartCard, which would present the system with a specially crafted response toAPDUs.Insufficient or missing checking of return values of functions leads tounexpected work with variables that have not been initialized.

criterions.comment: opensc package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
